ai-tha-ap359:1.2_0: He has crossed over the world.
ai-tha-ap359:1.3_0: My father then spoke to a beggar for alms,
ai-tha-ap359:2.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.
ai-tha-ap359:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap359:3.4_0: This is the fruit of a wrap.
ai-tha-ap359:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap359:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Suppiya.
ai-tha-ap359:6.1_0: The seventh Kaṇṭaka who was awakened;
